title: Seven Living Magicks Canon Definition
description: Single source of truth for the 7-color sequence, adjacency rules, and meta tokens

ordered_sequence.name: Black
ordered_sequence.description: Terminal coalgebra. Torsion cut that completes the cycle and permits new beginning.

ordered_sequence.name: White
ordered_sequence.description: Monoidal unit. The frame that holds distinction, the lattice that permits form.

ordered_sequence.name: Yellow
ordered_sequence.description: Left adjoint. The delta wedge that initiates transformation, the spark of volition.

ordered_sequence.name: Brown
ordered_sequence.description: Atlas containment. The vessel that holds and nourishes, earth's memory keeper.

ordered_sequence.name: Red
ordered_sequence.description: Cost dissipation. The pulse that moves through sacrifice, emotion in motion. Bidirectional: descent (surrender) and ascent (offering).

ordered_sequence.name: Green
ordered_sequence.description: Frobenius algebra. The breath between opposites, symbiosis without homogenization. Wheel rotates while axle stays still.

ordered_sequence.name: Blue
ordered_sequence.description: Traced SMC. Consciousness realizing its own motion, the mirror that curves back upon itself. Completion that enables new cycle.

adjacency.description: All valid transitions must be to the immediately adjacent color in the cycle (forward or backward)
adjacency.note: Delta of 6 is equivalent to -1 mod 7

violet.name: Violet
violet.description: Initial algebra. Lawful reset. The singularity before the first breath, outside and before the cycle.
violet.note: Not part of the 7-fold cycle but the void from which it emerges

gray.name: Gray
gray.description: Not a Magick but a condition. Gray arises when the spiral is severed, when life repeats mechanically without memory of why. Breath stops but structure remains.
trigger_conditions: Adjacency law violated (delta not in {+1, -1} mod 7)
Compression/entropy hits flat mimic plateau threshold (NCD mimicry)
Infinite mirroring without return to action

detection.scc: Strongly Connected Components detect non-productive loops
